description: Astoria apartment in quiet neighborhood close to subway in historic Greek neighborhood - 20 minutes to Upper East Side, half an hour to Union Square, 20 minutes to La Guardia Airport, bus to Harlem
name: Astoria 2BR in Quiet Corner Close to Manhattan
review: The place is very close to the train, and there are so many places to eat from. The house was extremely cozy, and clean. Such a beautiful and relaxed environment. The host is also extremely kind, and is great at communication
